doc.field: Meijers, L. Woordenschat Verdeelt in 1. Bastaardt-Woorden. 2. Konst-Woorden. 3. Verouderde Woorden (t'Amsteldam: Jeronimus Ratelband)
Meijers, L. Woordenschat Verdeelt in 1. Bastaardt-Woorden. 2. Konst-Woorden. 3. Verouderde Woorden (t'Amsteldam: Jeronimus Ratelband)

Book that belonged to Abraham Lott of Flatbush, with the engraved bookplate of "Abraham Lott" showing the family coat of arms. Signed on title page, "Abrm Lott junr 1762." The bookplate may be that of the senior Abraham Lott (1684â€“1754).
Offsite-Box: RC-16, envelope: Book (1745) with bookplate of Abraham Lott
